duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and improve the www.splashtop.com website, migrating from WordPress to Gatsby and Contentful
Optimize user experience to drive trial conversions and revenue
Manage trial forms with JavaScript and PHP, migrating to React and Gatsby serverless functions
Identify and implement process improvements, new technologies, and integrations
Develop project plans, monitor progress, and address problems or bugs
Collaborate with colleagues, managers, and stakeholders, and validate automated test scripts
Ensure industry-standard and device-compatible code, achieving company goals through active participation in projects

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or relevant field
